minitest.name: minitest dialect for writing tests
minitest.description: Allows writing of testsuites without inheritance or classes.

testExample.name: minitest example
testExample.description: Example using minitest for two trivial tests.

loopInvariant.name: Loop invariants dialect
loopInvariant.description: A small sample dialect enforcing loop invariants.

fsm.name: Finite state machine dialect
fsm.description: A dialect for implementing finite state machines as modules.

fsmExample.name: FSM client code
fsmExample.description: Example using finite state machine dialect.

whileLiteral.name: While: literal block dialect
whileLiteral.description: A dialect enforcing that while loops are written with literal blocks, and offering errors and suggestions when they are not.

whileLiteralExample.name: Example for literal block dialect
whileLiteralExample.description: Example code producing an error using the literal block dialect

objectAssociations.name: Object associations dialect
objectAssociations.description: A dialect for using object associations/relations in your program.

objectAssociationsExample.name: OA client code
objectAssociationsExample.description: Example using the object associations dialect.

requireTypes.name: Static Grace dialect
requireTypes.description: A dialect that requires static type annotations on all declarations.

dialect.name: Dialect dialect
dialect.description: A dialect to assist in writing other dialects and checkers.

dialectExample.name: Dialect client code
dialectExample.description: Example using the Dialect dialect to implement the requireTypes dialect in a more concise way.

grapl.name: GrAPL dialect
grapl.description: A Grace rendition of parts of APL, showing the use of operator definitions and other language features.

graplExample.name: GrAPL example
graplExample.description: Example using simple APL programs with the GrAPL dialect.

simplegraphicsExample.name: Simple graphics demo
simplegraphicsExample.description: Example using the cross-platform simple graphics library.

turtle.name: Turtle graphics module
turtle.description: Library to draw a turtle on the screen and allow it to be moved around by code.

logo.name: Logo-like dialect
logo.description: A dialect providing procedural turtle graphics access.

logo_example.name: Logo-like client code
logo_example.description: Example using the Logo-like turtle graphics dialect to draw a picture.

pong.name: DOM Pong
pong.description: Pong implemented on top of the HTML document object model directly.

sniffpong.name: Sniff-based pong
sniffpong.description: Example code in the Sniff dialect, implementing Pong.

staticTypes.name: Static structural typechecking
staticTypes.description: A typechecking dialect enforcing structural subtyping.

staticTypesExample.name: Static typing example
staticTypesExample.description: Sample code for the staticTypes dialect.

dbc.name: Design-by-contract dialect
dbc.description: A simple dialect including loop invariants and preconditions.
